title: VR-Based Short-Term Intensive Course for Customized Science Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic science theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Adjustable individual learning progress and difficulty levels to enhance job relevance for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can independently design personalized learning pathways in VR simulation environments with over 90% autonomy.
Learners can generate at least three practical solutions applicable to real-world tasks using customized resources when solving science domain problems.
Learners can reduce individual learning gaps by over 50% through formative assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
